TopicTitle: 1.2.2 KSP crashes after separating stage. Also RSSVE doesn't work.

Articles.Content: I have KSP 1.2.2 installed with Realistic Progression Zero, and RSS/RO Soviets Rockets and Spacecraft. When I separate my main stage, the game freezes, and crashes. Also, RSSVE does not give the enhancement properly. It gives a black sky with cyan color horizons. Could anybody help me with these problems, THANKS!
People can answer your questions if you eleborate a bit more.

KSP: 1.2.2 Windows 64-bit

Problem: Game crashes after separating a stage on RN-Vostok form Raidernick. RSSVE does not function properly as it gives a cyan horizon with a dark sky.

How to recreate: Manually install RSSVE and all of its dependencies. For the crashing, fly RN Vostok 1, separate the fairings and then the stage after it.

Mods: RP-0 with all of its dependencies. RSSVE and it's dependencies. 

 

Edited February 28, 2018 by JEB'S DESTINY

Please have a look again at the link I've send you, logs of the game will help much more

Edited February 22, 2018 by DrLicor

Log coming soon.

Look at the log, maybe you have a currupt or incorrect version of Principia loaded? I deleted some lines to make it fit. I don't run Scatter, EVE, RSS, or many other mods you have so I am not familiar if any are critical issues.

There are NullReferenceExceptions for Scatterer just before log ends, but as I mentioned. Your mod installation is so different from mine its hard to know of any conflicts you may have. I can only suggest making sure they are all the latest 1.2.2 version and correct dependencies. Then start removing mods to see if you can find the crash. Or a new install building it up a few mods at a time if you cant find the problems with this install.
But I am playing RP-0, so if I take away mods, then it won't work. I installed everything correctly using CKAN.
I have the same problem in 1.3.1
